character.name: Washerwoman
character.summary: You start knowing that 1 of 2 players is a particular Townsfolk.

character.name: Librarian
character.summary: You start knowing that 1 of 2 players is a particular Outsider. (Or that zero are in play.)

character.name: Investigator
character.summary: You start knowing that 1 of 2 players is a particular Minion

character.name: Chef
character.summary: You start knowing how many pairs of evil players there are.

character.name: Empath
character.summary: Each night, you learn how many of your 2 alive neighbors are evil.

character.name: Fortune Teller
character.summary: Each night, choose 2 players: you learn if either is a Demon. There is a good player that registers as a Demon to you.

character.name: Undertaker
character.summary: Each night*, you learn which character died by execution today.

character.name: Monk
character.summary: Each night*, choose a player (not yourself): they are safe from the Demon tonight

character.name: Ravenkeeper
character.summary: If you die at night, you are woken to choose a player: you learn their character

character.name: Virgin
character.summary: The 1st time you are nominated, if the nominator is a Townsfolk, they are executed immediately.

character.name: Slayer
character.summary: Once per game, during the day, publicly choose a player: if they are the Demon, they die.

character.name: Soldier
character.summary: You are safe from the Demon. (They cannot kill you & you are immune to their harmful effects.)

character.name: Mayor
character.summary: If only 3 players live & no execution occurs, your team wins. If you die at night, another player might die instead.

character.name: Butler
character.summary: Each night, choose a player (not yourself): tomorrow, you may only vote if they are voting too.

character.name: Saint
character.summary: If you die by execution, your team loses.

character.name: Recluse
character.summary: You might register as evil & as a Minion or Demon, even if dead.

character.name: Drunk
character.summary: You do not know you are the Drunk. You think you are a Townsfolk character, but you are not.

character.name: Poisoner
character.summary: Each night, choose a player: they are poisoned tonight and tomorrow day.

character.name: Spy
character.summary: Each night, you see the Grimoire. You might register as good & as a Townsfolk or Outsider, even if dead.

character.name: Baron
character.summary: There are extra Outsiders in play. [+2 Outsiders]

character.name: Scarlet Woman
character.summary: If there are 5 or more players alive & the Demon dies, you become the Demon. (Travellers don't count

character.name: Imp
character.summary: Each night*, choose a player: they die. If you kill yourself this way, a Minion becomes the Imp.
